status.description: 1 for success, 0 for API response error or invalid parameters

projectId.description: If property address is valid, PACE Tool creates a new project in PACE system and provides this project id. This Project ID can be used in other API calls to refer to this particular project.

ExpectedAmountData.description: If the property is eligible for pace funding, the API returns additional data points.

formula_data.description: Various fees and other parameters in PACE System.

apr.description: APR for this amortization schedule and these payment terms.

amount.description: Estimated approved amount for this property address.

externalDocs.description: Find out more about PACE Funding

parameters.description: PACE Funding send the credit decision on notify url
parameters.name: notify_url
